question: Which of the following islands became the first in the country to run 100% on solar power?
explanation: Diu Island is lying off the south coast of Gujarat\'s Kathiawar peninsula, separated from the mainland by a tidal creek. It has an area of 40 kmÂ². Diu has made rapid progress in solar power generation in the last three years. The Union territory has an area of just 42 square kilometres. Harnessing of a good amount of solar energy has made Diu Island, the first in the country to run 100% on solar energy.
